title: Cybersecurity Analyst

sections.full_text:
Cybersecurity Analyst
ShieldSecure Edmonton, AB

Responsibilities:
- Monitor SIEM dashboards (Splunk, QRadar)
- Investigate alerts and escalate incidents
- Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing
- Prepare security audit reports
sections.skills:
- Network security fundamentals
- SIEM (Splunk, QRadar)
- Python or Bash
- Linux administration

Preferred:
- CompTIA Security+ or similar certification

Preferred:
